plot: Employees at the E.A.R (Everybody's A little Racist) do their best to tackle every race problem that comes through their door but for lead agent Akosua Miller, the biggest case may be her own.
plot_en: Employees at the E.A.R (Everybody's A little Racist) do their best to tackle every race problem that comes through their door but for lead agent Akosua Miller, the biggest case may be her own.
plot_es: Employees at the E.A.R (Everybody's A little Racist) do their best to tackle every race problem that comes through their door but for lead agent Akosua Miller, the biggest case may be her own.
title: American Koko
